remarks: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hstrlem3.1 $e |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) $.
hstrlem3.2 $e |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) $.
hstrlem3.3 $e |- A e. CH $.
hstrlem3.4 $e |- B e. CH $.
hstrlem4 $p |- ( ph -> ( normh ` ( S ` A ) ) = 1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
$d u x $.
